content.text:
# Draft:Newsboys "The Kings Of Christian Rock"

Newsboys Are The No.1 Christian Rock Band Originated from Australia in 1985 The Newsboys have Released Over20 Studio Albums Their Latest Worldwide Revival (Deluxe) Has A new Lead Singer Adam Agee His Fresh ideas Gives the band a new look Also Lately the had a lot of bad reputation with their old lead singer the are coming out of the scandal and are playing everywhere soon fortress will be on The top 20 Please Support them it really isn't about them its about Jesus.
